I don’t have any insight beyond noting those parallels. But we’ve told ourselves this story before. I hope it helps us now that it’s real.
Exhibit B: HYDRA, a cabal of literal Nazis within Peggy Carter’s own SHIELD.
Exhibit A: Voldemort, long thought defeated, with followers all through Hogwarts and Wizarding governance, ready to go when he returns.
To wit: a stream of outright evil at the heart of a flawed but idealistic society, breaking out catastrophically after long dormancy.
Maybe minor in the scheme of things, but we have at least two major pop-culture franchises that capture this moment pretty damn well …
